name: Populus
description:
In the 21st century, humanity has everything it needs to tackle climate change. Cheap clean energy, clear roadmaps to a better future. However, the reason we cannot get change right now is because of big corporations, manipulating societal beliefs and narratives, spending millions to drown out support for clean energy. This game showcases the fact that people, if they organize and come together, can defeat misinformation, change narratives and create a better world, together. 

Keep your public opinion score above 50% to win the game!
